mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction( tran_no , trip_date , requirement, pay_type , product_no, host_no, tran_count, product_price, user_no, refund_code, pay_to_host_date, tran_price) VALUES ( seq_TRANSACTION_TRAN_NO.NEXTVAL , #{tripDate} , #{requirement:VARCHAR} , #{paymentType} , #{tranPro.productNo} , #{tranPro.hostNo} , #{count} , #{tranPro.productPrice} , #{buyerNo} , 1 , #{payToHostDate} , #{totalPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no , tran_date , trip_date , requirement, pay_type , product_no, host_no, tran_count, product_price, user_no, refund_code, pay_to_host_date, tran_price FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refund( refund_no , tran_no , refund_reg_date , refund_price , refund_account, refund_bank) VALUES ( seq_REFUND_REFUND_NO.NEXTVAL , #{tran_no} , SYSDATE , #{refundPrice} , #{refundAccount} , #{refundBank} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT refund_no, tran_no, refund_reg_date, refund_confirm_date, refund_price, refund_account, refund_bank FROM refund ORDER BY refund_no DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT
host_no, AVG(product_star_eval) as product_eval
host_no, AVG(host_star_eval) as host_eval
FROM transaction
GROUP BY product_no ORDER BY product_eval DESC
GROUP BY host_no ORDER BY host_eval DESC
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
